title: Who helped Eric Clapton write 'Wonderful Tonight'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Eric wrote Wonderful Tonight himself. The song was really out of frustration about Patty taking too long to get ready to go to a party. It turned into his biggest love song ever. Funny how music works like that.
I believe it was Mark Nafler from Dire straits Ya I spelt his last name wrong.
